mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dish_tags (dish_id, tag_name, tag_type, tag_value, weight, confidence, source, created_time, updated_time) VALUES (#{dishId}, #{tagName}, #{tagType}, #{tagValue}, #{weight}, #{confidence}, #{source}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dish_tags WHERE dish_id = #{dishId} ORDER BY weight DESC
SELECT * FROM dish_tags WHERE dish_id = #{dishId} AND tag_type = #{tagType} ORDER BY weight DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE dish_tags SET tag_name = #{tagName}, tag_type = #{tagType}, tag_value = #{tagValue}, weight = #{weight}, confidence = #{confidence}, source = #{source}, updated_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
